Nudist_0.Name: Nudist
Nudist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. {PAWN_pronoun} can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.

Bloodlust_0.Name: Bloodlust
Bloodlust_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. {PAWN_pronoun} is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.

Kind_0.Name: Kind
Kind_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. {PAWN_pronoun} rarely insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also never judges people by their appearance. {PAWN_possessive} agreeableness also makes {PAWN_objective} more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.

Psychopath_0.Name: Psychopath
Psychopath_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother {PAWN_objective} at all. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also feels no mood boost from socializing.

Cannibal_0.Name: Cannibal
Cannibal_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, {PAWN_pronoun} tried it... and {PAWN_pronoun} liked it.

Abrasive_0.Name: Abrasive
Abrasive_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} always says exactly what's on {PAWN_possessive} mind, especially if it's bugging {PAWN_objective}. That tends to rub people the wrong way.

TooSmart_0.Name: Too smart
TooSmart_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is too smart for {PAWN_possessive} own good. {PAWN_pronoun} learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.

Brawler_0.Name: Brawler
Brawler_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to fight up close and personal. {PAWN_possessive} accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but {PAWN_pronoun}'ll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.

Masochist_0.Name: Masochist
Masochist_0.Description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, there's something exciting about getting hurt. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't know why, {PAWN_pronoun}'s just wired differently.

NightOwl_0.Name: Night owl
NightOwl_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

{PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.

Greedy_0.Name: Greedy
Greedy_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} needs a really impressive bedroom. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get what {PAWN_pronoun} wants.

Jealous_0.Name: Jealous
Jealous_0.Description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.

Ascetic_0.Name: Ascetic
Ascetic_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. {PAWN_pronoun} will become unhappy if {PAWN_pronoun} has a bedroom that's too impressive. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. {PAWN_pronoun} never judges others by their appearance.

Gay_0.Name: Gay
Gay_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically and sexually attracted to people of {PAWN_possessive} own gender.

Bisexual_0.Name: Bisexual
Bisexual_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically and sexually attracted to people regardless of gender.

Asexual_0.Name: Asexual (aro)
Asexual_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is uninterested in sexual or romantic engagements.

AnnoyingVoice_0.Name: Annoying voice
AnnoyingVoice_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and {PAWN_pronoun} tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike {PAWN_objective}.

CreepyBreathing_0.Name: Creepy breathing
CreepyBreathing_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.

Pyromaniac_0.Name: Pyromaniac
Pyromaniac_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves fire. {PAWN_pronoun} will never extinguish fires, and will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. {PAWN_pronoun} will be happy around flames, and happier when wielding an incendiary weapon.

Wimp_0.Name: Wimp
Wimp_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize {PAWN_objective}.

Nimble_0.Name: Nimble
Nimble_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. {PAWN_pronoun} seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.

FastLearner_0.Name: Fast learner
FastLearner_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a knack for learning. {PAWN_pronoun} picks things up much faster than others.

SlowLearner_0.Name: Slow learner
SlowLearner_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is slow on the uptake. {PAWN_pronoun} learns much slower than others.

Undergrounder_0.Name: Undergrounder
Undergrounder_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no need to experience the outdoors or light. {PAWN_pronoun} will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever and is not bothered by darkness. However, {PAWN_nameDef} will be unhappy while outdoors.

Transhumanist_0.Name: Body modder
Transhumanist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels limited in {PAWN_possessive} feeble human body. {PAWN_pronoun} often dreams of being enhanced with artificial body parts or xenogenetics.

BodyPurist_0.Name: Body purist
BodyPurist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes the human body is limited for a reason. To {PAWN_objective}, artificial body parts and xenogenes are unethical and disgusting.

GreatMemory_0.Name: Great memory
GreatMemory_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a fantastic memory for detail. {PAWN_pronoun} will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.

Tough_0.Name: Tough
Tough_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. {PAWN_pronoun} is extremely hard to kill.

TorturedArtist_0.Name: Tortured artist
TorturedArtist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. {PAWN_pronoun} will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.

Gourmand_0.Name: Gourmand
Gourmand_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s life revolves around food. {PAWN_pronoun} gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.

QuickSleeper_0.Name: Quick sleeper
QuickSleeper_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether {PAWN_pronoun}'s sleeping on a bed or on the ground, {PAWN_pronoun} will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.

SpeedOffset_-1.Name: Slowpoke
SpeedOffset_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is always falling behind the group whenever [PAWN_pronoun] goes anywhere.

SpeedOffset_1.Name: Fast walker
SpeedOffset_1.Description: [PAWN_name] likes to be where [PAWN_pronoun]'s going. [PAWN_pronoun] walks quicker than most people.

SpeedOffset_2.Name: Jogger
SpeedOffset_2.Description: [PAWN_name] always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.

DrugDesire_2.Name: Chemical fascination
DrugDesire_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

DrugDesire_1.Name: Chemical interest
DrugDesire_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

DrugDesire_-1.Name: Teetotaler
DrugDesire_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. [PAWN_pronoun] strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.

NaturalMood_2.Name: Sanguine
NaturalMood_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is just naturally upbeat about [PAWN_possessive] situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.

NaturalMood_1.Name: Optimist
NaturalMood_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get [PAWN_objective] down.

NaturalMood_-1.Name: Pessimist
NaturalMood_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] tends to look on the bad side of life.

NaturalMood_-2.Name: Depressive
NaturalMood_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is perenially unhappy. [PAWN_pronoun] has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.

Nerves_2.Name: Iron-willed
Nerves_2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s will is an iron shield. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.

Nerves_1.Name: Steadfast
Nerves_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.

Nerves_-2.Name: Volatile
Nerves_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is on a hair-trigger all the time. [PAWN_pronoun] is the first to break in any tough situation.

Neurotic_1.Name: Neurotic
Neurotic_1.Description: [PAWN_name] likes to have things squared away. [PAWN_pronoun] will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can get the better of [PAWN_objective].

Neurotic_2.Name: Very neurotic
Neurotic_2.Description: [PAWN_name] feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. [PAWN_pronoun] will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can easily get the better of [PAWN_objective].

Industriousness_2.Name: Industrious
Industriousness_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.

Industriousness_1.Name: Hard worker
Industriousness_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.

Industriousness_-2.Name: Slothful
Industriousness_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] loves idleness and hates anything productive. [PAWN_pronoun] moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.

PsychicSensitivity_2.Name: Psychically hypersensitive
PsychicSensitivity_2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind is like a psychic tuning fork. [PAWN_pronoun] is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.

PsychicSensitivity_1.Name: Psychically sensitive
PsychicSensitivity_1.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.

PsychicSensitivity_-1.Name: Psychically dull
PsychicSensitivity_-1.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind is psychically out of tune with others. [PAWN_pronoun] isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.

PsychicSensitivity_-2.Name: Psychically deaf
PsychicSensitivity_-2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. [PAWN_pronoun] just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.

ShootingAccuracy_1.Name: Careful shooter
ShootingAccuracy_1.Description: [PAWN_name] takes more time to aim when shooting. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.

ShootingAccuracy_-1.Name: Trigger-happy
ShootingAccuracy_-1.Description: Pew! Pew! Pew! [PAWN_name] just likes pulling the trigger. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots faster than others, but less accurately.

Beauty_2.Name: Beautiful
Beauty_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to [PAWN_objective] before [PAWN_pronoun] even opens [PAWN_possessive] mouth.

Beauty_1.Name: Pretty
Beauty_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like [PAWN_objective].

Beauty_-1.Name: Ugly
Beauty_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.

Beauty_-2.Name: Staggeringly ugly
Beauty_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is staggeringly ugly. [PAWN_possessive] face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at [PAWN_objective] while conversing.

Immunity_1.Name: Super-immune
Immunity_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a naturally powerful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.

Immunity_-1.Name: Sickly
Immunity_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] has an awful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.

Delicate_0.Name: Delicate
Delicate_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has fragile skin and bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes more damage than other people from the same blows.
(Biotech)

Recluse_0.Name: Recluse
Recluse_0.Description:
The fewer people in {PAWN_nameDef}'s faction, the happier {PAWN_pronoun} is. Being alone is best of all.
(Biotech)

PerfectMemory_0.Name: Perfect memory
PerfectMemory_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has outstanding memory, both in terms of retaining information but also muscle memory. {PAWN_possessive} skills will never decay.
(Anomaly)

Occultist_0.Name: Occultist
Occultist_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has deep knowledge of the twisted patterns of dark psychic energy. {PAWN_pronoun} can study unnatural entities faster than others. {PAWN_pronoun} will also periodically teach this inhuman knowledge to others when {PAWN_pronoun} gets the chance.
(Anomaly)

Joyous_0.Name: Joyous
Joyous_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has the ability to make everyone feel better and inspire them to be the best version of themselves.
(Anomaly)

BodyMastery_0.Name: Body mastery
BodyMastery_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} doesn't have basic needs like eating, sleeping, or comfort. {PAWN_possessive} body is driven by some unknown mechanism, which has turned {PAWN_possessive} eyes completely white.
(Anomaly)

Disturbing_0.Name: Disturbing
Disturbing_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is a peculiar person who seems fixated on horrendous ideas. Talking to {PAWN_objective} is often upsetting.
(Anomaly)

VoidFascination_0.Name: Void fascination
VoidFascination_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is strangely intrigued by unnatural entities and is easily enthralled by them.
(Anomaly)

BS_Giant_0.Name: Tough sinews
BS_Giant_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is able to use oversized weapons.
(Big and Small - Framework)

VFEP_WarcasketTrait_0.Name: Warcasket
VFEP_WarcasketTrait_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is entombed in a warcasket. No amount of pain will have an effect on them, and they can never go into a pain shock or drop unconscious due to pain. Because of how bulky the armor is and how much energy it takes to use it, {PAWN_nameDef} is not capable of doing any work.
(Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates)

VFEP_Shellcasket_0.Name: Shellcasket
VFEP_Shellcasket_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} was entombed in a warcasket, and then brutally pulled out of one. The neural and nerve damage from being unplugged is so severe that {PAWN_nameDef} is in constant, agonizing pain and can barely assemble his thoughts. Only installing {PAWN_nameDef} back in a warcasket can cure the symptoms.
(Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates)

VPE_Thrall_0.Name: Thrall
VPE_Thrall_0.Description:
Psychic enthrallment caused by incredibly strong mental influence. Thralls don't need to sleep or have recreation, but are unable to do skilled work and engage in social interactions.
(Vanilla Psycasts Expanded)

AG_Beauty_2.Name: Angelic beauty
AG_Beauty_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] possesses an unnatural, almost pristine beauty that makes [PAWN_objective] stand out among others of [PAWN_possessive] kind.
(Alpha Genes)

AG_Beauty_-2.Name: Repulsive
AG_Beauty_-2.Description:
[PAWN_name] is so unfathomably ugly and grotesque that merely looking at [PAWN_objective] is enough to make other people nauseous.
(Alpha Genes)

VCEF_Fisherman_0.Name: Fisherman
VCEF_Fisherman_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. {PAWN_pronoun} will prefer fishing above other activities.
(Vanilla Fishing Expanded)

VTE_AbsentMinded_0.Name: Absent-minded
VTE_AbsentMinded_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} tends to let {PAWN_possessive} mind drift, even in the middle of work. {PAWN_pronoun} may sometimes stop tasks at random.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Eccentric_0.Name: Eccentric
VTE_Eccentric_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a screw loose, but it comes with a sharper scientific mind.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Perfectionist_0.Name: Perfectionist
VTE_Perfectionist_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} strives for perfection in {PAWN_possessive} work. {PAWN_pronoun} produces higher-quality products, but works more slowly. Failing to meet {PAWN_possessive} standards causes unhappiness, and on rare occasions {PAWN_pronoun} may abandon a project mid-way.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Coward_0.Name: Coward
VTE_Coward_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef}'s instincts lean heavily toward cowardice. In danger, {PAWN_pronoun} will often hide or run before standing to fight.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Brave_0.Name: Brave
VTE_Brave_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has stronger mental and physical fortitude than most. {PAWN_pronoun} can endure pain more readily, and is slower to break under harsh conditions.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Clumsy_0.Name: Clumsy
VTE_Clumsy_0.Description:
Minor bruises and scrapes plague {PAWN_nameDef}, usually from tripping or falling due to poor coordination.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_HeatInclined_0.Name: Heat inclined
VTE_HeatInclined_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the heat of a dry summer day. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in warmth.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_ColdInclined_0.Name: Cold inclined
VTE_ColdInclined_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the chill of a brisk winter night. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind shivering or sleeping in the cold.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_HeavySleeper_0.Name: Heavy sleeper
VTE_HeavySleeper_0.Description:
A bomb could go off beside {PAWN_nameDef} while {PAWN_pronoun} sleeps, and {PAWN_pronoun} would keep right on sleeping. {PAWN_pronoun} can't be bothered to work or defend the colony mid-nap.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Neat_0.Name: Neat
VTE_Neat_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is naturally hygienic and organized. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't track dirt or scatter trash, and enjoys cleaning.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Slob_0.Name: Slob
VTE_Slob_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is naturally sloppy, leaving trash and dirt scattered around. At least {PAWN_pronoun} isn't much bothered by messy surroundings.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Workaholic_0.Name: Workaholic
VTE_Workaholic_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} struggles to take breaks or rest mid-job. {PAWN_pronoun} will keep working, even at the expense of {PAWN_possessive} health or sleep.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_IronStomach_0.Name: Iron stomach
VTE_IronStomach_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has never known nausea. Food poisoning and vomiting are foreign to {PAWN_objective}.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_AnimalLover_0.Name: Animal lover
VTE_AnimalLover_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} can't stand cruelty toward animals and strive to rescue as many as they can. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when nuzzled, but is more deeply upset when losing one. {PAWN_pronoun} also refuses to butcher animals.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_AnimalHater_0.Name: Animal hater
VTE_AnimalHater_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} believes in human superiority over animals. {PAWN_pronoun} dislikes bonding or being nuzzled, but feels satisfaction when animals die or are sold.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_BigBoned_0.Name: Big-boned
VTE_BigBoned_0.Description:
Whether from bulk or awkward posture, {PAWN_nameDef} has broken a few chairs in {PAWN_possessive} time, and is likely to break more.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Rebel_0.Name: Rebel
VTE_Rebel_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} only plays by {PAWN_possessive} own rules. When forced, {PAWN_pronoun} will drag {PAWN_possessive} feet and work more slowly.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Submissive_0.Name: Submissive
VTE_Submissive_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} needs clear direction on when and how to act. {PAWN_pronoun} works at normal speed only when ordered, and otherwise slows down.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Vengeful_0.Name: Vengeful
VTE_Vengeful_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is fueled by spite. {PAWN_pronoun} cant stand sharing the colony with rivals, and feels happier when one of them dies.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Technophobe_0.Name: Technophobe
VTE_Technophobe_0.Description:
Whether from trauma or fear of change, {PAWN_nameDef} rejects modernity. {PAWN_pronoun} may lash out at machines, refuses to research, and feels satisfaction from destroying mechanoids.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_FunLoving_0.Name: Fun-loving
VTE_FunLoving_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} lives for a good time. {PAWN_pronoun} remembers parties fondly, and the joy lasts far longer than it does for most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Dunce_0.Name: Dunce
VTE_Dunce_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has limited mental capacity. {PAWN_pronoun} learns slowly and struggles with conversation, but tends to be naturally happy.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_MartialArtist_0.Name: Martial artist
VTE_MartialArtist_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has trained in melee combat and learned a special move to disarm opponents.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Snob_0.Name: Snob
VTE_Snob_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Squeamish_0.Name: Squeamish
VTE_Squeamish_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} cant stand the sight of blood or corpses, often vomiting when exposed. {PAWN_possessive} panic reflexes, however, make {PAWN_objective} surprisingly good at avoiding bleeding wounds.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Anxious_0.Name: Anxious
VTE_Anxious_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is naturally anxious, especially in social situations. {PAWN_pronoun} avoids gatherings and sometimes retreats to {PAWN_possessive} room to cope.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Insatiable_0.Name: Insatiable
VTE_Insatiable_0.Description:
No amount of lovin is ever enough for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} tends to move between partners and seeks intimacy often.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Prude_0.Name: Prude
VTE_Prude_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} gives {PAWN_possessive} body only to a spouse and would never initiate divorce. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes nudity more than most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_CouchPotato_0.Name: Couch potato
VTE_CouchPotato_0.Description:
An armchair and a screen are all {PAWN_nameDef} needs to be happy. {PAWN_pronoun} never tires of watching television, and always feels good after.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_CatPerson_0.Name: Cat person
VTE_CatPerson_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the company of cats and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes dogs.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_DogPerson_0.Name: Dog person
VTE_DogPerson_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the company of dogs and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes cats.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Prodigy_0.Name: Prodigy
VTE_Prodigy_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a sharp, logical mind. {PAWN_pronoun} researches faster than most, and {PAWN_possessive} rational outlook makes {PAWN_objective} less prone to mental breaks.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Menagerist_0.Name: Menagerist
VTE_Menagerist_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} believes animals are essential to life and society. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier with more of them around, and is especially skilled at taming and training.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_ChildOfSea_0.Name: Ocean lover
VTE_ChildOfSea_0.Description:
The sea calls to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when near the ocean or a deep river.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_ChildOfMountain_0.Name: Mountain lover
VTE_ChildOfMountain_0.Description:
The mountains call to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when near a large mountain.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_MadSurgeon_0.Name: Mad surgeon
VTE_MadSurgeon_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} hides a twisted obsession. {PAWN_pronoun} treats organ harvesting as a dark experiment and takes pleasure in it. Harvesting makes {PAWN_objective} happy, but going too long without fuels growing unrest.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_DrunkenMaster_0.Name: Drunken master
VTE_DrunkenMaster_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} fights best when drunk. {PAWN_pronoun} grows more dangerous in melee the more intoxicated {PAWN_pronoun} becomes.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Kleptomaniac_0.Name: Kleptomaniac
VTE_Kleptomaniac_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is compelled to steal, even from guests and allies, risking angering others.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Stoner_0.Name: Stoner
VTE_Stoner_0.Description:
Smokeleaf is a way of life for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} adores it and would rather die than give it up.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Lush_0.Name: Lush
VTE_Lush_0.Description:
Alcohol is a way of life for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} adores drinking and would rather die than give it up.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Wanderlust_0.Name: Wanderlust
VTE_Wanderlust_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} loves to travel and feels happiest on the move. {PAWN_pronoun} grows restless when staying too long in one place, but moves quickly and forages well while caravanning.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Insomniac_0.Name: Insomniac
VTE_Insomniac_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is never fully asleep or awake. {PAWN_pronoun} lurches along in a slow, shambler-like state, and only sleeps once every few days.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_WorldWeary_0.Name: World weary
VTE_WorldWeary_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has grown tired of the world. {PAWN_pronoun} struggles with bleak thoughts, making {PAWN_possessive} personality difficult to befriend.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Desensitized_0.Name: Desensitized
VTE_Desensitized_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is hardened by old emotional trauma. {PAWN_pronoun} feels nothing from death or loss, whether animal, colonist, family, or prisoner.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_RefinedPalate_0.Name: Refined palate
VTE_RefinedPalate_0.Description:
Only the finest meals satisfy {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels indifferent toward ordinary food, but savors lavish meals and gains greater joy from them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Academian_0.Name: Academian
VTE_Academian_0.Description:
Through scholastic pursuit, {PAWN_nameDef} has become well-read. {PAWN_pronoun} excels in science and medicine, and tends patients with greater skill.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Groundbreaker_0.Name: Groundbreaker
VTE_Groundbreaker_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} believes infrastructure is everything. {PAWN_pronoun} is a natural builder and stoneworker, constructing and mining with greater speed and efficiency.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Gastronomist_0.Name: Gastronomist
VTE_Gastronomist_0.Description:
To {PAWN_nameDef}, food is art. {PAWN_pronoun} creates beautiful, delicious meals that are almost always safe to eat.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Ecologist_0.Name: Ecologist
VTE_Ecologist_0.Description:
Flora and fauna are vital to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} uses every part of plants and animals, and appreciates natures gifts.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Tycoon_0.Name: Tycoon
VTE_Tycoon_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has an eye for silver and a silver tongue to match. {PAWN_pronoun} values {PAWN_possessive} own goods highly, and convinces others to do the same.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_ThickSkinned_0.Name: Thick skinned
VTE_ThickSkinned_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_ThinSkinned_0.Name: Thin skinned
VTE_ThinSkinned_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Schizoid_0.Name: Schizoid
VTE_Schizoid_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} bottles up {PAWN_possessive} feelings for long stretches of time. When the pressure grows too great, {PAWN_pronoun} may suddenly break down.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

Hygienic_2.Name: Germaphobe
Hygienic_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] is obsessed with germs and will wash much more frequently than normal.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)

Hygienic_1.Name: Hygienic
Hygienic_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is very hygienic and will wash more frequently.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)

Hygienic_-1.Name: Unhygienic
Hygienic_-1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is very unhygienic and will wash less frequently.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)

Hygienic_-2.Name: Slob
Hygienic_-2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has very low standards of cleanliness and will only wash when they absolutely have to.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)

VME_Elder_0.Name: Elder
VME_Elder_0.Description:
Either the body or mind of {PAWN_nameDef} is one of insight and experience. While some find them old fashioned, others will respect their guidance.
(Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures)
VME_Elder_0.ModSource: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

AM_Ahimsa_0.Name: Vow of nonviolence
AM_Ahimsa_0.Description:
A strict principle of nonviolence which applies to all living things.
(Alpha Memes)

PE_LowTechProficiency_0.Name: Low-tech proficient
PE_LowTechProficiency_0.Description:
This person is proficient with low-tech equipment.
(Progression: Education)

PE_FirearmProficiency_0.Name: Firearm proficient
PE_FirearmProficiency_0.Description:
This person is proficient with firearm equipment.
(Progression: Education)

PE_HighTechProficiency_0.Name: High-tech proficient
PE_HighTechProficiency_0.Description:
This person is proficient with high-tech equipment.
(Progression: Education)

Passioned_Learning_0.Name: Studious
Passioned_Learning_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} learns faster in skills they lack passion in.

(This increase to no-passion learning will not show in the skill UI)
(Big and Small - Genes & More)

Very_Passioned_Learning_0.Name: Very studious
Very_Passioned_Learning_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} learns much faster in skills they lack passion in.

(This increase to no-passion learning will not show in the skill UI)
(Big and Small - Genes & More)

BS_AnimalFriend_0.Name: Animal friend
BS_AnimalFriend_0.Description:
There is something about {PAWN_nameDef} that makes predators not consider them prey
(Big and Small - Genes & More)

BS_AlcoholAddict_0.Name: Alcohol lover
BS_AlcoholAddict_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] loves alcohol. [PAWN_pronoun] will never stop being addicted to it.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)

BS_Gentle_0.Name: Gentle
BS_Gentle_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a gentle and cool-headed nature. {PAWN_pronoun} is less likely to insult others or starts fights, and will sometimes cheer up others.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)

BS_InsultProof_0.Name: Uninsultable
BS_InsultProof_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] doesn't react to insults or to either part failing a flirt attempt.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)

BS_Unpretentious_0.Name: Unpretentious
BS_Unpretentious_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] isn't bothered by rough appearances, a bit of rough living. [PAWN_name] also doesn't care as much for royal titles.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)

Gigantism_0.Name: Gigantism
Gigantism_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is truly gigantic by the standards of their kind. They are sturdier than usual, but being significantly larger than normal for their kind does slow them down somewhat and make them more prone to early heart attacks and other health-issues.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)

Large_0.Name: Large
Large_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is both taller and bulkier than usual for their kind. This makes them sturdier but slightly slower.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)

Small_0.Name: Small
Small_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is a bit smaller than usual for their kind.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)

Dwarfism_0.Name: Dwarfism
Dwarfism_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is much smaller than usual for their kind.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)

VRE_Flirty_0.Name: Flirty
VRE_Flirty_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is always ready with a flirtatious comment or a playful compliment, lifting the spirits of those around {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} has a knack for making others feel special and desired, however this may sometimes lead to complicated situations when {PAWN_possessive} playful intentions are misinterpreted.
(Vanilla Races Expanded - Highmate)

VRE_Distressed_0.Name: Distressed
VRE_Distressed_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is exceptionally empathetic and sensitive to the suffering of others. Whenever {PAWN_pronoun} witnesses pain or hardship, it deeply affects {PAWN_objective}, resulting in memories of these events haunting {PAWN_nameDef} for a much longer time.
(Vanilla Races Expanded - Highmate)

FamilyPerson_0.Name: Family person
FamilyPerson_0.Description:
Family is everything for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys being around family members and knows the way around kids. Family joys and sorrows resonate with {PAWN_possessive} more than others.
(Family Ties)

MasterCraftsmanTrait_0.Name: Craftsmaster
MasterCraftsmanTrait_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has extensive experience in construction and crafting. {PAWN_pronoun} will work faster than others and nearly always succeed at construction and repairs.
(Integrated Creep Joiners)

MasterCookTrait_0.Name: Master chef
MasterCookTrait_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has extensive experience in cooking. {PAWN_pronoun} will cook faster than others and never cause food poisoning.
(Integrated Creep Joiners)

ViolentMind_0.Name: Violent mind
ViolentMind_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is predisposed towards violence and will frequently try to harm others.
(Integrated Creep Joiners)

MPT_BladeWhisperer_0.Name: Blade whisperer
MPT_BladeWhisperer_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} knows the spirit of all arms. If {PAWN_pronoun} is not bonded to a weapon already, upon equipping a non-biocodable melee weapon, it will generate a single persona weapon trait and will bond to them. Should {PAWN_nameDef} ever unequip the weapon, it will lose these traits.
(More Persona Traits)

ReunionCharacter_3.Name: Ally
ReunionCharacter_3.Description:
[PAWN_name] is an ally who will one day join your faction.
(Reunion)

Straight_0.Name: Straight
Straight_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is romantically and sexually attracted to people of the opposite gender.
(Way Better Romance)

HeteroAce_0.Name: Asexual (hetero)
HeteroAce_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is uninterested in sexual engagements, but is romantically attracted to people of the opposite gender.
(Way Better Romance)

HomoAce_0.Name: Asexual (homo)
HomoAce_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is uninterested in sexual engagements, but is romantically attracted to people of {PAWN_possessive} own gender.
(Way Better Romance)

BiAce_0.Name: Asexual (bi)
BiAce_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is uninterested in sexual engagements, but is romantically attracted to people regardless of gender.
(Way Better Romance)

Faithful_0.Name: Faithful
Faithful_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} will never cheat on a partner, no matter how bad the relationship gets.
(Way Better Romance)

Philanderer_0.Name: Philanderer
Philanderer_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} just cannot be trusted to stay faithful to a partner.
(Way Better Romance)

LCK_Architect_0.Name: Architect
LCK_Architect_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a great sense for structural planning and aesthetic design, making them excellent a building both functional and beautiful things.
((LYN) Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update))
LCK_Architect_0.ModSource: [LYN] Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update)

LCK_Assassin_0.Name: Anatomist
LCK_Assassin_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has an excellent understanding of anatomy. This makes them an excellent surgeon - and a deadly assassin.
((LYN) Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update))
LCK_Assassin_0.ModSource: [LYN] Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update)

VTE_Herbalist_0.Name: Herbalist
VTE_Herbalist_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a lot of knowledge about herbs and spices, and know how to use them to cook incredibly tasty meals.
((LYN) Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update))
VTE_Herbalist_0.ModSource: [LYN] Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update)

LCK_Hunter_0.Name: Hunter
LCK_Hunter_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is skilled at hunting wild animals. They know how to blend in the environment and shoot with perfect accuracy.
((LYN) Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update))
LCK_Hunter_0.ModSource: [LYN] Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update)

LCK_Professor_0.Name: Erudite
LCK_Professor_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has spent a lot of time learning, both by reading books and by talking with other people. They are well-spoken and have a brilliant mind.
((LYN) Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update))
LCK_Professor_0.ModSource: [LYN] Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update)

LCK_Scavenger_0.Name: Scavenger
LCK_Scavenger_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is good at extracting compacted metals from ancient ruins and turning them into useful works of crafstmanship - and faster than most people.
((LYN) Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update))
LCK_Scavenger_0.ModSource: [LYN] Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update)

LCK_Soldier_0.Name: Soldier
LCK_Soldier_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] have had training with both melee and ranged weapons before. After fighting many battles, they became an experienced combatant.
((LYN) Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update))
LCK_Soldier_0.ModSource: [LYN] Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded (Unoffical Update)

VFEP_WarcasketTrait_Mech_0.Name: Mech warcasket
VFEP_WarcasketTrait_Mech_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is entombed in a mech master warcasket. No amount of pain will have an effect on them, and they can never go into a pain shock or drop unconscious due to pain. {PAWN_nameDef} will be unable to do most tasks, except those necessary to maintain and build mechanoids.

RimScent_Anosmic_0.Name: Anosmic
RimScent_Anosmic_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has no sense of smell. While {PAWN_pronoun} cannot enjoy pleasant aromas, {PAWN_pronoun} is also completely immune to foul odors, smoke, and biological stenches.
(RimScent)

RimScent_KeenNose_0.Name: Keen nose
RimScent_KeenNose_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} possesses an unnaturally sharp sense of smell. {PAWN_pronoun} is twice as sensitive to all smells.
(RimScent)

RimScent_Dysosmic_0.Name: Dysosmic
RimScent_Dysosmic_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef}'s olfactory system is wired backwards. {PAWN_pronoun} finds the smell of rot, filth, or smoke strangely alluring, while fresh rain or clean air makes {PAWN_objective} feel uneasy.
(RimScent)

ST_Manipulative_0.Name: Manipulative
ST_Manipulative_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is good at getting {PAWN_possessive} way. Be it love bombing or gaslighting, {PAWN_possessive} victims rarely notice whats truly going on.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Naive_0.Name: Naive
ST_Naive_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} was taught everyone is good and kind. Maybe one day {PAWN_pronoun} will learn the lesson the hard way.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Narcissist_0.Name: Narcissist
ST_Narcissist_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} believes in pretty privilege. {PAWN_pronoun} is desperate to achieve flawless beauty by any means.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_HealthNut_0.Name: Health nut
ST_HealthNut_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef}s body is a temple, {PAWN_pronoun} only eats food to survive. {PAWN_pronoun} is here for a long time, not a good time.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Emotional_0.Name: Emotional
ST_Emotional_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} feels {PAWN_possessive} emotions more profoundly and experiences greater mood swings. {PAWN_pronoun} often cries to release any frustration.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Paranoid_0.Name: Paranoid
ST_Paranoid_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} believes good luck is an illusion and bad things are bound to happen. {PAWN_pronoun} is always ready for the worst case scenario.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Goofball_0.Name: Goofball
ST_Goofball_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} acts funny in the day-to-day life. {PAWN_possessive} silly nature often amuses others.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Loyal_0.Name: Loyal
ST_Loyal_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is never gonna give you up.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_PartyAnimal_0.Name: Party animal
ST_PartyAnimal_0.Description:
For {PAWN_nameDef}, every season is party season!
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Insane_0.Name: Insane
ST_Insane_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} always seem out of place. No one knows whats going on in {PAWN_possessive} head, not even {PAWN_objective}self.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Proper_0.Name: Proper
ST_Proper_0.Description:
Follow the dress code, say the right word. {PAWN_nameDef} has immaculate manners that navigate {PAWN_objective} through every social occasion.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Grumpy_0.Name: Grumpy
ST_Grumpy_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} always seems annoyed, especially on a Monday. Others around {PAWN_objective} are constantly afraid to trigger {PAWN_possessive} grumbles.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Shy_0.Name: Shy
ST_Shy_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} struggles to socialise with other people, {PAWN_pronoun} especially cherish it while being on the receiving end of kindness.

Over the time, {PAWN_nameDef} have learned to spend more time on organising and introspecting {PAWN_objective}self.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Materialistic_0.Name: Materialistic
ST_Materialistic_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes buying and bragging about {PAWN_possessive} new possessions.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Vegan_0.Name: Vegan
ST_Vegan_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} avoids eating meat. {PAWN_pronoun} believes animals should not be treated as commodities and knows how to use plants to make delicious meals.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Devout_0.Name: Devout
ST_Devout_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} devotes {PAWN_possessive} body and soul to what {PAWN_pronoun} believes. Somehow, {PAWN_possessive} prayers get answered.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Procrastinator_0.Name: Procrastinator
ST_Procrastinator_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes to put things off until the last minute. {PAWN_pronoun} still manages to get those tasks done but the results are usually lacklustre.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_NonCommital_0.Name: Non-committal
ST_NonCommital_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} becomes tense after a while in the same job or relationship. {PAWN_possessive} fear of commitment facilitates change.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_HighMaintenance_0.Name: High maintenance
ST_HighMaintenance_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} can feel a pea under twenty mattresses while sleeping. {PAWN_pronoun} is born blue blood with expensive taste and trivial problems.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_FamilyOriented_0.Name: Family oriented
ST_FamilyOriented_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} want big families and enjoy being surrounded by children. {PAWN_pronoun} will make an excellent parent!
(The Sims Traits)

ST_SteadyHands_0.Name: Steady hands
ST_SteadyHands_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a pair of steady hands that never shakes or even trembles under pressure.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Daredevil_0.Name: Daredevil
ST_Daredevil_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} enjoys chaos and takes the extreme side in life. {PAWN_pronoun} cant quit the adrenaline rush from being reckless.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Chatterbox_0.Name: Chatterbox
ST_Chatterbox_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes to talk and {PAWN_pronoun} sure talks a lot. People around {PAWN_objective} have started to develop immunity to whatever {PAWN_pronoun} says.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Bookworm_0.Name: Bookworm
ST_Bookworm_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a deep love for reading. {PAWN_pronoun} reads fast and enjoys expanding {PAWN_possessive} knowledge this way.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Handy_0.Name: Handy
ST_Handy_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes to get on with {PAWN_possessive} hands and tinkers around. {PAWN_pronoun} has the natural aptitude of handling those tiny precision components.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Virtuoso_0.Name: Virtuoso
ST_Virtuoso_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a natural gift with musical and instruments. It is as if the music {PAWN_pronoun} plays lingered in the air.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_TechWhiz_0.Name: Tech whiz
ST_TechWhiz_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is brilliant with computers and technology. {PAWN_pronoun} can hack into other peoples data and security systems with ease.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Gambler_0.Name: Gambler
ST_Gambler_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} believes in {PAWN_possessive} own luck. Despite the crippling addiction, {PAWN_possessive} luck certainly tips in a different direction on the battlefield.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Childish_0.Name: Childish
ST_Childish_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} never lost that childlike wonder. {PAWN_pronoun} sees things through the eyes of a child and need to be constantly entertained.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Nosy_0.Name: Nosy
ST_Nosy_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} ignores others' boundaries and likes pressing for more information, this often rubs people the wrong way.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_HugePower_0.Name: Huge power
ST_HugePower_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is noted for {PAWN_possessive} incredible strength, increasing melee armor penetration and neolithic weapon range.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Observant_0.Name: Observant
ST_Observant_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a pair of keen eyes that scans through every detail and miss no strange things. {PAWN_pronoun} can even spot distant ships while stargazing through a telescope.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Zen_0.Name: Zen
ST_Zen_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} takes time to discover beauty in everything. {PAWN_pronoun} sees the world in a grain of sand.

To {PAWN_objective}, actively sabotaging life is a despicable act.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Submissive_0.Name: Submissive
ST_Submissive_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} wants to be told what to do. Following rules and obeying authority are their second nature.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_DrunkenMaster_0.Name: Drunken master
ST_DrunkenMaster_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. {PAWN_pronoun} claim to become more talented the more drunk {PAWN_pronoun} are.
(The Sims Traits)

ST_Insomniac_0.Name: Insomniac
ST_Insomniac_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is never really asleep or awake. {PAWN_pronoun} is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly.
(The Sims Traits)

VQE_IdealPatient_0.Name: Ideal patient
VQE_IdealPatient_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef}'s body accepts archite alterations with unnatural ease. {PAWN_pronoun} will never suffer rejections during the injection process.
(Vanilla Quests Expanded - Ancients)

DankPyon_Fighter_0.Name: Fighter
DankPyon_Fighter_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a formidable fighter. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to effectively handle a weapon and take blows.
(Medieval Overhaul)

DankPyon_Veteran_0.Name: Veteran
DankPyon_Veteran_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a veteran. [PAWN_pronoun] has experienced countless of horrifying battles enough to break a common man.
(Medieval Overhaul)

SEX_Solitary_0.Name: Solitary
SEX_Solitary_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is comfortable with isolation. {PAWN_pronoun} does not have a need for intimacy.
(Intimacy - A Lovin' Expansion)

SEX_Affectionate_0.Name: Affectionate
SEX_Affectionate_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is quite the social butterfly. {PAWN_pronoun} has an increased need for intimacy.
(Intimacy - A Lovin' Expansion)
